Freshly baked cheese (wait you don't bake cheese??)⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
```
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⣴⣶⣶⣤⣤⣤⣤⣀⣀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣠⣴⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡿⠿⠟⠛⢉⣉⣤⣤⣶⣶⣿⣿⣿⣿⡇⠀
⠀⠀⢀⣠⣾⡿⢋⣡⣤⣄⠉⢉⣁⣤⣤⣶⣾⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡇⠀
⠀⠐⢋⣉⣠⠀cheese ⣸⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡇⠀
⠀⣿⣿⣿⣿⣧⣄⣉⣁⣤⣾⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⠟⠋⠉⠛⢿⣿⣿⡇⠀

⠀⠀⠀⠀⣾⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡿⠿⠗⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
```
